verbs.description: [ARG1: summer - like heat] [V: continues] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of a mid - week cold front] a few clouds will linger into the evening hours with warm and muggy conditions temperatures will slowly fall back through the 70s showers and storms to develop wednesday temperatures drop with the onset of rain
